content: Yes, there are equipment rental shops on Pulau Kapas where you can rent snorkeling gear, as well as other water sports equipment such as kayaks and stand-up paddleboards. Some of the resorts on the island offer rental equipment, or you can check with local rental shops that cater to tourists. It's recommended that you bring a waterproof bag to keep your valuables safe while engaging in water sports activities. Additionally, make sure to ask for safety advice from the rental shop staff and follow the guidelines they provide while using the equipment. This will ensure an enjoyable and safe experience while exploring the beautiful beaches and coral reefs around the island.
